post.author: Adi Winata
post.title: First Post
post.content:
This is my first post for my own personal website. This website is just only to share everything what i know, my hobbies that is computer programming language and music.

My name is Adi Winata, i working as a .net software developer on PT. Gibeon Solutions. I would love to do all programming language, open source, and 3D programming. Javascript is a powerfull code programming language and i am very exited with it.

Besides that, i love music. I playing guitar when i was secondary hight schools. I love blues music like black blues, jimi hendrix, ZZ Top, Stevie Ray Vaughn, Johnny Winter and Ritchie Kotzen also. My favourits band are Mr. Big and Extreme.
